text: is a former Formula 3000 driver from Japan. He competed in his first F3000 race at Spa in 1998. His best race result was at Germany in 1998. He drove again in F3000 in 2000, for World Racing Team. He did not manage to qualify for the first three races of the season. Later that year, he test drove for Benetton-Playlife. ==Complete Formula 3000 results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" ! Year !
